alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 17 at 1:47AM MDT until April 17 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Rapid City area and the Pennington County Plains. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
